survey_name: Community Feedback on Public Park Improvements
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather community input on potential improvements to local public parks to enhance usability and satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you visit your local public park?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you visit your local public park?

questions.question_text: What activities do you typically engage in when visiting the park? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE), with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What activities do you typically engage in when visiting the park? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your local park?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your local park?

questions.question_text: How important is the availability of shaded areas in the park?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring importance. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How important is the availability of shaded areas in the park?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to participate in community-led park cleanup or improvement events?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Include a range of commitment levels.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to participate in community-led park cleanup or improvement events?
